name: Really Random Questions
summary: 40 random questions! Can you answer them all?
description: 40 random questions are waiting to see if you can answer them. Can you answer them all the first time around and win the ultimate prize? Good luck!

posts.title: First question
posts.text: Here is your first random question so I will start off easy. How many wheels does a reliant robin have?

posts.title: Dvd prize
posts.text: Unlucky! But here is your consolation prize! An empty dvd case! Have fun and see you next time!

posts.title: Second question
posts.text: Well done! Here is your second question. Who is Jeremy Kyle?

posts.title: Granny
posts.text: So close yet so far! Your consolation prize is giving a sponge bath to a granny at an old folks home

posts.title: Mother!?
posts.text: Are you insane?! You must be! Oh well your wrong your consolation prize is a plate of tripe! Lucky you!

posts.title: Barrymore
posts.text: Actually your right he is but your still wrong. Why you ask. Its because he is crap at his job. But for a good guess your prize is a trip in a landrover with micheal barrymore.

posts.title: Redwall
posts.choice: A guy who wears a suit and is caked in foundation
posts.text: Totally right! He may be a brittish talk show host but this is who he really is! Your next question is a redwall one (you should have seen this one coming). Who were the warriors who traveled to loamhedge to find sister armels secret for Martha Braebuck?
